Name: Forde
Description:
The Division of Forde consists of:

  • part of the Gold Coast City Council, and
  • part of the Logan City Council.
NameDerivation: Named in honour of Francis Michael Forde, 1890-1983, Prime Minister of Australia (July 1945) and a Member of the House of Representatives (1922-46).
Members:
Van Manen, B (LNQ) 2010-
Raguse, B (ALP) 2007-2010
Elson, K (LP) 1996-2007
Crawford, M C (ALP) 1987-1996
Watson, D J H (LP) 1984-1987
DemographicRating: Outer Metropolitan - situated in capital cities and containing large areas of recent suburban expansion
